sqlMap.select: SELECT id, name, address, telephone FROM mkaddrtb ORDER BY name
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO mkaddrtb(name, address, telephone, gender , relationship,birthday, comments, registedate, id) VALUES (#name#, #address#, #telephone#, #gender# , #relationship#,#birthday#, #comments#, #registedate#, mkaddrtb_seq.nextval)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE mkaddrtb SET name = #name# ,address = #address# ,telephone = #telephone# ,gender = #gender# ,relationship = #relationship# ,birthday = #birthday# ,comments = #comments# ,registedate = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') WHERE id = #id#
